vote.title: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement, with three one-year renewal options, for the purchase of licenses, training, and subscription services for a vulnerability management platform solution for the Department of Information and Technology Services with Future Com, Ltd. through The Interlocal Purchasing System cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $290,234 - Financing:  Information Technology Equipment Fund ($103,320) and Data Services Fund ($186,914)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement, with three one-year renewal options, for the purchase of licenses, training, and subscription services for a vulnerability management platform solution for the Department of Information and Technology Services with Future Com, Ltd. through The Interlocal Purchasing System cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $290,234 - Financing:  Information Technology Equipment Fund ($103,320) and Data Services Fund ($186,914)
